name: analytics
author: Colin Berry
description: Opt-in collection of information on Flashpoint usage.

com.analytics.basic.title: Essential (Restart Required)
com.analytics.basic.description: Enables collection of basic data. (Launcher Version / Startup Events)

com.analytics.games.title: Games
com.analytics.games.description: Enables collection of Game launch statistics. (Game Launches)

com.analytics.php-reporting.title: PHP Reporting
com.analytics.php-reporting.description: Helps with repacking Legacy Games into zips. Listens for Games trying to load files from the PHP server and reports the ID and URL pair.

com.analytics.hardware.title: Simplified Hardware Info
com.analytics.hardware.description: Sends back simplified hardware info, includes Operating System version and Total System Memory

com.analytics.delete-button.title: Submit Deletion Request
com.analytics.delete-button.description: Opens the deletion form in browser, disables all analytics and randomizes a new User ID.
